title: Po Po Po Lyrics Manam Kothi Paravai
stanzas:
<div>
Po Po Po Lyrics Manam Kothi Paravai

po po po
nee enga vena po
po po po
nee onnum venaam po

enaku onum kavala illa
podi thangam po
nee yaravena jodi seru
sogam illa po

po po po
nee enga vena po
po po po
nee onnum venaam po

nooru jenmam rani pola
vazhapora poomaane
ennapola evanum illa
Â sollapora neethane

pachakili neeye vittuparanthaaye
sollama kollama ennoda
illama thallada vitutiyae

po po po
nee enga vena po
po po po
nee onnum venaam po

thangame ennidam ennakurai kooru
vathiye vittathe kannukullum neeru

ointhidamale siru vayathil
oonjaladinom
maaridamale naduvayathil noolaikodinom
orunaal kooda neengamal
kaeli pesinom

namai veraga paarthorai
yeno yesinom
selvame

po po po
nee koodu vittu po
po po po
nee koorum kettu po

un kalladi pattu
naan kandathila kaayam.
solladi pattu naan
nipathenna nyayam.

kaathalodu neerilidavae
kaavalaginen
kaanalaagi nee paranthidave
saagapogiren

unnai seramal vaazhnthale
yaedhu nimmathi
ennai yerkamal ponale
podi unvidhi unvidhi

enaku onum kavala illa
podi thangam po
nee yaravena jodi seru
sogam illa po

po po po
nee thaalikatti po
po po po
nana vaazhaavetti po.

nooru jenmam rani pola
vazha pora poomaane
ennapola evanum illa
sollapora neethaane.

pachcha kili neeye
vittu paranthaaye
sollama kollama ennoda
illama thallada vitutiyae
category: Song:Po Po Po - Manam Kothi Paravai
